service.name: forum
service.description: Implementation of an simple forum system. It is possible to create threads and set the status to sticky or closed
service.author: Christoph Kappestein <k42b3.x@gmail.com>

database.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.forum}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `globalId` VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, `pageId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `sticky` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `closed` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `urlTitle` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, `title` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, `text` LONGTEXT NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `globalId` (`globalId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

INSERT INTO `{table.user_activity_template}` (`type`, `verb`, `table`, `path`, `summary`) VALUES ('INSERT', 'add', 'amun_service_forum', 'view?id={record.id}', '
